ChangeList.Description: Added multi-factor authentication (MFA) requirement for self-service operations for supported authentication methods. Starting January 20, 2026, users who manage their own authentication methods through self-service operations, such as adding, updating, or deleting phone numbers and email addresses, must complete multifactor authentication (MFA) if they haven't authenticated within the last 10 minutes of their current session. For more guidance on handling this change in your application, see [Microsoft Entra authentication methods API overview](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/authenticationmethods-overview?view=graph-rest-1.0).
Added the [x509CertificateAuthorityScope](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/x509CertificateAuthorityScope?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added the **certificateAuthorityScopes** property to the [x509CertificateAuthenticationMethodConfiguration](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/x509CertificateAuthenticationMethodConfiguration?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the **x509CertificateCRLValidationConfigurationState** enumeration type.
Added the [x509CertificateCRLValidationConfiguration](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/x509CertificateCRLValidationConfiguration?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.

Added the **crlValidationConfiguration** property to the [x509CertificateAuthenticationMethodConfiguration](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/x509CertificateAuthenticationMethodConfiguration?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.
Added the **x509CertificateCRLValidationConfigurationState** enumeration type.
Added the [x509CertificateCRLValidationConfiguration](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/x509CertificateCRLValidationConfiguration?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added the **crlValidationConfiguration** property to the [x509CertificateAuthenticationMethodConfiguration](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/x509CertificateAuthenticationMethodConfiguration?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Removed the previously deprecated and retired **passwordlessMicrosoftAuthenticatorAuthenticationMethodConfiguration** resource and its associated methods. Please use the [microsoftAuthenticatorAuthenticationMethodConfiguration](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/microsoftauthenticatorauthenticationmethodconfiguration?view=graph-rest-beta) resource and its associated methods instead.

Removed the previously deprecated and retired **creationDateTime** property from the [fido2AuthenticationMethod](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/fido2AuthenticationMethod?view=graph-rest-beta) resource type. Use the **createdDateTime** property instead.

Removed the previously deprecated and retired **displayAppInformationRequiredState** property of the [microsoftAuthenticatorAuthenticationMethodTarget](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/microsoftAuthenticatorAuthenticationMethodTarget?view=graph-rest-beta) resource. Use the **displayAppInformationRequiredState** property of the [microsoftAuthenticatorFeatureSettings](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/microsoftAuthenticatorFeatureSettings?view=graph-rest-beta) resource instead.

Removed the previously deprecated and retired **numberMatchingRequiredState** property of the [microsoftAuthenticatorAuthenticationMethodTarget](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/microsoftAuthenticatorAuthenticationMethodTarget?view=graph-rest-beta) resource. Use the **numberMatchingRequiredState** property of the [microsoftAuthenticatorFeatureSettings](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/microsoftAuthenticatorFeatureSettings?view=graph-rest-beta) resource instead.
Added the **authenticationStrengthRoot** relationship to the [conditionalAccessRoot](https://learn.microsoft.com/graph/api/resources/conditionalAccessRoot?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the **authenticationStrengthPolicies** relationship to the [policyRoot](https://learn.microsoft.com/graph/api/resources/policyRoot?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the [authenticationStrengthPolicy](https://learn.microsoft.com/graph/api/resources/authenticationStrengthPolicy?view=graph-rest-beta) resource and its associated methods.
Added the **authenticationMethodModes** enumeration type.
Added the **authenticationStrengthPolicyType** enumeration type.
Added the **authenticationStrengthRequirements** enumeration type.
Added the **baseAuthenticationMethod** enumeration type.
Added the [updateAllowedCombinationsResult](https://learn.microsoft.com/graph/api/resources/updateAllowedCombinationsResult?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the [authenticationStrengthUsage](https://learn.microsoft.com/graph/api/resources/authenticationStrengthUsage?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the [authenticationCombinationConfiguration](https://learn.microsoft.com/graph/api/resources/authenticationCombinationConfiguration?view=graph-rest-beta) resource and its associated methods.
Added the [authenticationMethodModeDetail](https://learn.microsoft.com/graph/api/resources/authenticationMethodModeDetail?view=graph-rest-beta) resource and its associated methods.
Added the [fido2CombinationConfiguration](https://learn.microsoft.com/graph/api/resources/fido2CombinationConfiguration?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added the [updateAllowedCombinations](https://learn.microsoft.com/graph/api/authenticationstrengthpolicy-updateAllowedCombinations?view=graph-rest-beta) method to the [authenticationStrengthPolicy](https://learn.microsoft.com/graph/api/resources/authenticationStrengthPolicy?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added the [findByMethodMode](https://learn.microsoft.com/graph/api/authenticationstrengthpolicy-findByMethodMode?view=graph-rest-beta) method to the [authenticationStrengthPolicy](https://learn.microsoft.com/graph/api/resources/authenticationStrengthPolicy?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added the [usage](https://learn.microsoft.com/graph/api/authenticationstrengthpolicy-usage?view=graph-rest-beta) method to the [authenticationStrengthPolicy](https://learn.microsoft.com/graph/api/resources/authenticationStrengthPolicy?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added the **featureSettings** property to the [microsoftAuthenticatorAuthenticationMethodConfiguration](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/microsoftAuthenticatorAuthenticationMethodConfiguration?view=graph-rest-beta) resource. This property allows you to configure Microsoft Authenticator settings such as number matching and location context, and whether they are enabled for all users or specific users only.
Added the [microsoftAuthenticatorFeatureSettings](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/microsoftAuthenticatorFeatureSettings?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the **featureTargetType** enumeration.

Added the [authenticationMethodFeatureConfiguration](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/authenticationMethodFeatureConfiguration?view=graph-rest-beta) resource. Use this resource to configure users that are allowed from using an authentication method.
Added the [featureTarget](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/featureTarget?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Deprecated the **displayAppInformationRequiredState** property of the [microsoftAuthenticatorAuthenticationMethodTarget](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/microsoftAuthenticatorAuthenticationMethodTarget?view=graph-rest-beta) resource. Use the **displayAppInformationRequiredState** property of the [microsoftAuthenticatorFeatureSettings](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/microsoftAuthenticatorFeatureSettings?view=graph-rest-beta) resource instead.

Deprecated the **numberMatchingRequiredState** property of the [microsoftAuthenticatorAuthenticationMethodTarget](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/microsoftAuthenticatorAuthenticationMethodTarget?view=graph-rest-beta) resource. Use the **numberMatchingRequiredState** property of the [microsoftAuthenticatorFeatureSettings](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/microsoftAuthenticatorFeatureSettings?view=graph-rest-beta) resource instead.
Added the **authenticationMethodsPolicyMigrationState** enumeration.

Added the **excludeTargets** property to the [authenticationMethodConfiguration](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/authenticationMethodConfiguration?view=graph-rest-beta) resource. Use this property to specify the groups of users that are excluded from an authentication methods policy.
Added the **policyMigrationState** property to the [authenticationMethodsPolicy](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/authenticationMethodsPolicy?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added the **isSoftwareOathEnabled** property to the [microsoftAuthenticatorAuthenticationMethodConfiguration](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/microsoftAuthenticatorAuthenticationMethodConfiguration?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added the [softwareOathAuthenticationMethodConfiguration](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/softwareOathAuthenticationMethodConfiguration?view=graph-rest-beta) resource and its associated methods.

Added the [voiceAuthenticationMethodConfiguration](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/voiceAuthenticationMethodConfiguration?view=graph-rest-beta) resource and its associated methods.
Added the [voiceAuthenticationMethodTarget](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/voiceAuthenticationMethodTarget?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the **authenticationMethodsPolicyMigrationState** enumeration type.
Added the `excludeTargets` property to the [authenticationMethodConfiguration](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/authenticationMethodConfiguration?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.
Added the `policyMigrationState` property to the [authenticationMethodsPolicy](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/authenticationMethodsPolicy?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.

Added the `isSoftwareOathEnabled` property to the [microsoftAuthenticatorAuthenticationMethodConfiguration](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/microsoftAuthenticatorAuthenticationMethodConfiguration?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.
Added the [smsAuthenticationMethodConfiguration](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/smsAuthenticationMethodConfiguration?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource
Added the [smsAuthenticationMethodTarget](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/smsAuthenticationMethodTarget?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource
Added the [softwareOathAuthenticationMethodConfiguration](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/softwareOathAuthenticationMethodConfiguration?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource
Added the [voiceAuthenticationMethodConfiguration](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/voiceAuthenticationMethodConfiguration?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource
Added the [voiceAuthenticationMethodTarget](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/voiceAuthenticationMethodTarget?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource

Added the `companionAppAllowedState` property to the [microsoftAuthenticatorFeatureSettings](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/microsoftAuthenticatorFeatureSettings?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the **authenticationMethodModes** enumeration type.
Added the **authenticationStrengthPolicyType** enumeration type.
Added the **authenticationStrengthRequirements** enumeration type.
Added the **baseAuthenticationMethod** enumeration type.
Added the [updateAllowedCombinationsResult](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/updateAllowedCombinationsResult?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource type.
Added the [authenticationCombinationConfiguration](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/authenticationCombinationConfiguration?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource
Added the [authenticationMethodModeDetail](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/authenticationMethodModeDetail?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource
Added the [authenticationStrengthPolicy](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/authenticationStrengthPolicy?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource
Added the [authenticationStrengthRoot](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/authenticationStrengthRoot?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource
Added the [conditionalAccessRoot](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/conditionalAccessRoot?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource
Added the [fido2CombinationConfiguration](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/fido2CombinationConfiguration?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource
Added the **authenticationStrengthPolicies** relationship to the [policyRoot](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/policyRoot?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.

Added the [updateAllowedCombinations](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/authenticationstrengthpolicy-updateallowedcombinations?view=graph-rest-1.0) method to the [authenticationStrengthPolicy](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/authenticationStrengthPolicy?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.

Deprecated the **authenticationStrengths** relationship of the [conditionalAccessRoot](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/conditionalAccessRoot?view=graph-rest-beta) resource. See the **authenticationStrength** relationship instead.

Deprecated the **findByMethodMode** function of the [authenticationStrengthPolicy](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/authenticationStrengthPolicy?view=graph-rest-beta) resource. To retrieve authentication strength policies that include specified authentication method modes, use the following syntax: `GET /policies/authenticationStrengthPolicies?$filter=allowedCombinations/any(x:x has 'sms, password')`.
Added the **x509CertificateAffinityLevel** enumeration type.
Added the `issuerSubjectAndPolicyOID` member to the **x509CertificateRuleType** enumeration.

Added the **x509CertificateDefaultRequiredAffinityLevel** property to the [x509CertificateAuthenticationModeConfiguration](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/x509CertificateAuthenticationModeConfiguration?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the **issuerSubjectIdentifier** property to the [x509CertificateRule](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/x509CertificateRule?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the **policyOidIdentifier** property to the [x509CertificateRule](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/x509CertificateRule?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the **x509CertificateRequiredAffinityLevel** property to the [x509CertificateRule](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/x509CertificateRule?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the **trustAffinityLevel** property to the [x509CertificateUserBinding](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/x509CertificateUserBinding?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the [passkeyAuthenticationMethodTarget](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/passkeyAuthenticationMethodTarget?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the **x509CertificateIssuerHintsState** enumeration type.
Added the [x509CertificateIssuerHintsConfiguration](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/x509CertificateIssuerHintsConfiguration?view=graph-rest-beta) resource type.

Added the `issuerHintsConfiguration` property to the [x509CertificateAuthenticationMethodConfiguration](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/x509CertificateAuthenticationMethodConfiguration?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the [reportSuspiciousActivitySettings](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/reportSuspiciousActivitySettings?view=graph-rest-beta) resource type.

Added the `reportSuspiciousActivitySettings` property to the [authenticationMethodsPolicy](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/authenticationMethodsPolicy?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added the [hardwareOathAuthenticationMethodConfiguration](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/hardwareOathAuthenticationMethodConfiguration?view=graph-rest-beta) resource and its associated methods.

Added the `enforceRegistrationAfterAllowedSnoozes` property to the [authenticationMethodsRegistrationCampaign](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/authenticationMethodsRegistrationCampaign?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added the [x509CertificateCombinationConfiguration](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/x509CertificateCombinationConfiguration?view=graph-rest-beta) resource. Use this resource type to restrict an authentication strength policy to specific certificate properties.

Added the [externalAuthenticationMethodConfiguration](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/externalAuthenticationMethodConfiguration?view=graph-rest-beta) resource and its associated methods.
Added the [openIdConnectSetting](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/openIdConnectSetting?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the [x509CertificateCombinationConfiguration](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/x509CertificateCombinationConfiguration?view=graph-rest-1.0) resource.
Added the [qrCodePinAuthenticationMethodConfiguration](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/qrCodePinAuthenticationMethodConfiguration?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the **attestationEnforcement** enumeration type.
Added the **passkeyTypes** enumeration type.

Added the **defaultPasskeyProfile** property to the [fido2AuthenticationMethodConfiguration](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/fido2AuthenticationMethodConfiguration?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added the **passkeyProfiles** relationship to the [fido2AuthenticationMethodConfiguration](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/fido2AuthenticationMethodConfiguration?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added the **allowedPasskeyProfiles** property to the [passkeyAuthenticationMethodTarget](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/passkeyAuthenticationMethodTarget?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the [passkeyProfile](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/passkeyProfile?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the [verifiableCredentialAuthenticationMethodTarget](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/verifiableCredentialAuthenticationMethodTarget?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added the [verifiableCredentialsAuthenticationMethodConfiguration](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/verifiableCredentialsAuthenticationMethodConfiguration?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
